text: Theo "Teddy" Peckham (born November 10, 1987) is a Canadian professional ice hockey defenceman currently playing for the Saugeen Shores Winterhawks. ==Career== He started his hockey career with the North York Rangers of the Ontario Junior Hockey League and played a season with them. He then moved on to play for the Owen Sound Attack of the Ontario Hockey League for three seasons. He was drafted by the Edmonton Oilers with the 75th overall pick in the 2006 NHL Entry Draft. He debuted for the Oilers during a March 7, 2008 game against the Columbus Blue Jackets and scored his first goal during a November 11, 2010 game against the Detroit Red Wings. On July 19, 2013, he was signed as a free agent to a one-year contract by the Chicago Blackhawks. ==References== == Other websites == * * * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Black Canadian sportspeople Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Edmonton Oilers players Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Oklahoma City Barons players Category:People from Richmond Hill, Ontario Category:Rockford IceHogs (AHL) players Category:Springfield Falcons players Category:ECHL players Category:Ontario Hockey League players
title: Theo Peckham
